description:
[https://docs.sentry.io/api/events/list-an-issues-hashes/](https://docs.sentry.io/api/events/list-an-issues-hashes/)

This endpoint lists an issue's hashes, which are the generated checksums used to aggregate individual events.

### Path Parameters

`issue_id` *(string)* REQUIRED

The ID of the issue to retrieve.

### Query Parameters:

`cursor` *(string)*

A pointer to the last object fetched and its sort order; used to retrieve the next or previous results.

### Scopes

You need to [authenticate via bearer auth token.](https://docs.sentry.io/api/auth) requires one of the following scopes:

*   `event:read`
